title: Polynomial Evaluation Function
description: This function computes the value of a polynomial at a given point X using an array of coefficients C. The polynomial is represented in the form P(X) = c[0] + c[1]*X + c[2]*X^2 + ... + c[7]*X^7. The function should return the computed polynomial value as a REAL number.
name: F_POLY

input.name: X
input.description: The input value at which the polynomial is to be evaluated.

input.name: C
input.description: An array of coefficients for the polynomial, where each index corresponds to the coefficient for X to the power of the index.

return_value.description: The resulting value of the polynomial evaluated at X.
